languages.text: Ксавьер Калькасар спустился на планету Эпитафия. Вольному Торговцу предстоит последовать за ним.
Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.
languages.original_text: Ксавьер Калькасар спустился на планету Эпитафия. Вольному Торговцу предстоит последовать за ним.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar a débarqué à la surface d'Épitaphe. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'a pas d'autre choix que de le suivre.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar a débarqué à la surface d'Épitaphe. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'a pas d'autre choix que de le suivre.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎来到了荒垄碑碣。行商浪人别无选择，只能继续寻找他。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎来到了荒垄碑碣。行商浪人别无选择，只能继续寻找他。

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサルは墓碑の惑星の表面に向かった。ローグトレーダーは彼の後を追うほかない。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサルは墓碑の惑星の表面に向かった。ローグトレーダーは彼の後を追うほかない。

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar ist auf die Oberfläche der Welt Epitaph gegangen. {mf|Dem Freihändler|Der Freihändlerin} bleibt keine Wahl, als ihm zu folgen.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar ist auf die Oberfläche der Welt Epitaph gegangen. {mf|Dem Freihändler|Der Freihändlerin} bleibt keine Wahl, als ihm zu folgen.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar ha viajado a la superficie del planeta llamado Epitafio. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no tiene más opción que seguirle.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar ha viajado a la superficie del planeta llamado Epitafio. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no tiene más opción que seguirle.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar, Sinyazıt dünyasının yüzeyine indi. Hür Tacir'in onun peşinden gitmekten başka seçeneği yok.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar went to the surface of the world of Epitaph. The Rogue Trader has no choice but to go after him.
